alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Davidson; Durham; Granville; Lee; Moore; Orange; Person; Randolph; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 12:31PM EDT until July 09 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alamance County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... Person County in central North Carolina... Orange County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Davidson County in central North Carolina... Granville County in central North Carolina... Randolph County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Lee County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Durham County in central North Carolina... Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1229 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Person County to Randolph County moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail heavy rainf and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Burlington, Asheboro, Graham, Oxford, Roxboro and Hillsborough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Chatham; Davidson; Durham; Granville; Lee; Moore; Orange; Person; Randolph; Wake
